title: Cosmic Explorer.
content:
# Welcome to Cosmic Explorer

Cosmic Explorer is your gateway to the wonders of the universe. Our website is dedicated to bringing you the latest news and discoveries in space exploration, astronomy, and astrophysics.

Our team of experts scours the cosmos to bring you the most fascinating stories and stunning images from around the galaxy. From the latest missions to Mars and beyond, to the mysteries of dark matter and black holes, we've got it all.

But we're not just about the science. At Cosmic Explorer, we believe that exploring the universe should be fun and accessible to everyone. That's why we also feature engaging articles, videos, and interactive content that will inspire and entertain you.

So come join us on our journey through the cosmos. Whether you're a seasoned astronomer or just starting out, there's something for everyone at Cosmic Explorer.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A stylized depiction of a spacecraft in orbit around a distant planet or moon, with dramatic lighting and shadows."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
